title: 'Do you feel guilty?' - Watch BBC reporter challenge smuggler as he follows lethal drugs trade
description: Quentin Sommerville gains access to a cartel's operation as the US grapples with hundreds of thousands of opioid deaths.
excerpt: Quentin Sommerville gains access to a cartel's operation as the US grapples with hundreds of thousands of opioid deaths.
text: President Donald Trump sees his trade war as a way of pressuring Mexico to do more to stop the flow of illegal drugs into the US. BBC correspondent Quentin Sommerville travelled to the US-Mexico border and tracked down fentanyl smugglers - before speaking to addicts in Philadelphia. Watch as he meets some of the drug operatives and challenges them over the deaths their pills are causing.Cameraman: Darren Conway
html:
President Donald Trump sees his trade war as a way of pressuring Mexico to do more to stop the flow of illegal drugs into the US.

BBC correspondent Quentin Sommerville travelled to the US-Mexico border and tracked down fentanyl smugglers - before speaking to addicts in Philadelphia.

Watch as he meets some of the drug operatives and challenges them over the deaths their pills are causing.

Cameraman: Darren Conway
